Help:Node.title: Command Usage: !dismiss
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: !dimiss [character] "[reason]"
EXAMPLE: !dimiss troublemaker "Kept swearing at the other players."
Sends a character to the Out-Of-Character. Should be used with care, only if other things such as discussion or muting have failed.
SEE ALSO: !disconnect, !mute, !suspend
